sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Rinse rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. Soak in water for 6-8 hours. 2. Drain the water and blend into a smooth batter, adding water as needed. 3. Add salt to the batter and mix well. 4. Heat a non-stick skillet or dosa pan over medium heat. 5. Pour a ladleful of batter onto the skillet and spread in a circular motion to form a thin pancake. 6. Drizzle olive oil around the edges of the dosa. 7. Cook until golden brown and crispy on the bottom. 8. Flip and cook the other side until golden brown. 9. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort/> <image/> <ingredients>Rice (1 cup), Urad Dal (1/4 cup), Fenugr</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Breakfast">b08512df9751021069a3b6fce053afd4</meal_type> <name>Dosa</name> <nutrition>Calories: 150, Protein: 5g, Fat: 5g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. 2. Blend into a smooth batter.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7c91d71f9795021069a3b6fce053af6a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
